title: Downlooru
desc: Bulk Download Application for Booru-Type Image-servers.

title: CSFLopApp
desc: Private Android Application that calculates complex mathematical operations in the Industrial Security Field.

title: CSFHazApp
desc: Private Android Application that calculates complex mathematical operations in the Industrial Security Field.

title: Bot Brico Tienda
desc: A Bot for the Brico Shop made with MS Bot Framework

title: Acuacar API
desc: An API system used to check water usage meters using an Online AI to determine many values associated with pictures taken by operators. Many controllers and a KPI system is included to further analize the results of water meter check either with a daily, weekly or monthly temporality.

title: SmartGreen API
desc: Added support for the MQTT Communication Protocol, encoding data in Base64 from/to Hexadecimal to send messages to low-power devices that utilize the LoRa modulation technique through MQTT.

title: FIRA API
desc: A system dedicated to livestreamed e-commerce where clients can watch a product presentation, comment and purchase products live with an extensive list of payment methods.
